column4: Hi ! I'm using ubuntu 11.04 since yesterday and I was wondering if I should install my Nvidia drivers, because I can only run gnome 2 without them... (G 210M)
Meaning : is it going to work or crash
nvidias are pretty good with linux, and you can always go back to the old one if it fails
you should use the software manager though, don't install it from a website
